metadata.name: Love letter
metadata.description:
This girl is a letter carrier who delivers words of love.
She appears with a gentle spring breeze and soft sunshine.

The colorful colors represent the words that are unique to each person. The heart overflowing from the bag represents the heart of a person. When the love inside you is full and overflowing, you can be kind to others.

I drew this with the hope that if someone sends a letter with loving words, the recipient will also reply with loving words.
